item.title: BC-3 East at BC-43 North - Sparwood
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-43 North in Sparwood. Turn left for BC-43 north to Elkford; continue east on BC-3 for the Alberta Border.

item.title: BC-3 East - Hosmer
item.description: Entering Hosmer (Unincorporated) on BC-3 east.

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east in Fernie. Distance to Sparwood and Lethbridge (Alberta).

item.title: BC-3 East - Fernie
item.description: BC-3 east in Fernie. Turn right on 4th St. for (Fernie) City Centre. Continue east on BC-3 for Sparwood and Lethbridge (Alberta).

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east. Distance to Fernie, Sparwood, and Lethbridge (Alberta).

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-93 South
item.description: BC-3 east at BC-93 south to US Border. Continue east on BC-3 for Fernie and Alberta Border. BC-93 south leaves BC-3 east here.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95 Junction
item.description: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95 Junction. Exit for BC-93/BC-95 north to Invermere and Radium Hot Springs. Continue straight for BC-3 East/BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (Alberta). BC-93 south joins BC-3 east to Elko.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95
item.description: Approaching BC-3 East/BC-95 North split in 1300 metres. BC-3 East joins BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (AB). BC-95/BC-93 north to Invermere and Radium Hot Springs.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-95A
item.description: BC-3/BC-95 west to Fernie and Radium Hot Springs at BC-95A to Kimberley and Airport.

item.title: BC-3 East Approaching BC-95A
item.description: Use BC-93/BC-95 north for Fort Steele, Fairmont, and Invermere, approaching BC-95A on BC-3 east.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North Approaching BC-95A
item.description: BC-3 East/BC-95 North approaching BC-95A. Use BC-95A North for Kimberley and (Canadian Rockies International) Airport. Continue on BC-3 East/BC-95 North for Radium and Fernie.

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east. Distance to Cranbrook, Kimberley, and Fernie.

item.title: BC-95 North - Distance Marker For BC-3 West
item.description: Distance Marker For BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) on BC-95 north. Distance to Nelson and Creston. Many of the border crossings near the Crowsnest Highway have signs showing distance along the Crowsnest Highway.

item.title: BC-22 South at BC-3B - Trail
item.description: BC-22 South at BC-3B in Trail. Turn right for BC-22 South/BC-3A West to Rossland/Warfield. Continue straight for BC-3B to BC-22A/BC-3/Trail City Centre/Salmo. BC-3B West joins BC-22A South to Rossland.

item.title: BC-3 West - BC-22 Offramp at 6th Ave.
item.description: BC-3 West - BC-22 Offramp at 6th Ave. in Castlegar. Continue ahead for BC-22 south/Trail and Castlegar City Centre.

item.title: BC-3 West at BC-22 South Interchange
item.description: BC-3 West at BC-22 South/Trail interchange.

item.title: End BC-3A West at BC-3
item.description: End BC-3A West at BC-3. Use BC-3 West for Castlegar, Grand Forks, and Trail.

item.title: BC-3A West approaching BC-3
item.description: BC-3A West approaching BC-3. Use right lane for BC-3 West/Castlegar. Use left lane for BC-3 East/Weigh Station/Salmo.

item.title: BC-3 West - Castlegar City Centre
item.description: BC-3 west at Castlegar City Centre interchange.

item.title: BC-3 West at BC-22 South - Castlegar
item.description: BC-3 West at BC-22 South in Castlegar. Use BC-22 south for Castlegar and Trail. Continue west on BC-3 for Castlegar City Centre and Grand Forks.

item.title: BC-3 West - Castlegar - Next 2 Exits
item.description: Castlegar - Next 2 Exits on BC-3 West

item.title: End BC-3A West at BC-3
item.description: End BC-3A West at BC-3. Use BC-3 West for Castlegar, Grand Forks, and Trail.

item.title: BC-3A West approaching BC-3
item.description: BC-3A West approaching BC-3. Use right lane for BC-3 West/Castlegar. Use left lane for BC-3 East/Weigh Station/Salmo.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A - Creston
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Creston. Turn right to continue east on BC-3.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A North
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A North in Creston. Turn left for BC-3A North to Kootenay Lake Ferry; turn right for BC-3 East to Creston and Cranbrook. BC-3A is an alternate route to BC-3 and follows Kootenay Lake and the Kootenay River west before re-joining BC-3 in Castlegar.

item.title: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A)
item.description: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A) in Creston. Turn left for BC-3 West to Salmo and Castlegar. Turn right for (BC-3 East), BC-3A North/Kootenay Lake Ferry.

item.title: BC-21 North at Erickson Road
item.description: BC-21 North at Erickson Road. Turn right for Erickson Road east and BC-3 east. Continue north on BC-21 for BC-3 west.

item.title: BC-21 North Approaching Erickson Road
item.description: BC-21 North approaching Erickson Road in Creston. Use Erickson Road west for BC-3 East/Creston/Cranbrook. Continue north on BC-21 for BC-3 East to Nelson and Castlegar.

item.title: BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) at BC-97
item.description: BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) at BC-97 in Osoyoos. Use BC-97 north for Oliver and Penticton. Use BC-97 south for US Border and Oroville (Washington).

item.title: BC-3 West at BC-97
item.description: BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) at BC-97 in Osoyoos. Continue west on BC-3 for Keremeos and Vancouver.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-97
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-97 in Osoyoos. Continue east on BC-3 for Rock Creek and Grand Forks.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A Junction
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A Junction in Keremeos.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Keremeos
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Keremeos

item.title: BC-3 East Approaching BC-3A
item.description: BC-3 East approaching BC-3A in Keremeos.

item.title: BC-3 East - Keremeos
item.description: BC-3 East in Keremeos. Turn left to continue east on BC-3 to Penticton and Osoyoos. The BC-3 shield on the overhead sign does not use the Crowsnest Highway logo.

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east. Distance to Keremeos, Osoyoos, and Penticton.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-5A - Princeton
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-5A in Princeton. Turn left for BC-5A North to Merritt and Kamloops. Continue east on BC-3 for Osoyoos and Grand Forks.

item.title: BC-3 East - Princeton City Centre
item.description: BC-3 East - Princeton City Centre 2nd left. Maximum 50 km/h.

item.title: BC-3 East - Maximum 80 km/h
item.description: BC-3 East - Maximum 80 km/h

item.title: BC-3 East - Sunday Summit
item.description: Sunday Summit - Elevation 1282m on BC-3 east. Sunday Summit is a mountain pass in the Cascade Range.

item.title: BC-5 North/BC-3 East - Alternate Routes To the Okanagan
item.description: Alternate Routes To the Okanagan BC-5 North (via BC-97D) and BC-3 East.

item.title: BC-5 North/BC-3 East - Exit 173
item.description: BC-5 North/BC-3 East approaching Exit 173 - Hope.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 170 and Begin BC-5/BC-3
item.description: TC-1 East - Exit 170 - TC-1 East/Prince George/Hope. Freeway continues east as BC-5 North to Merritt and Kamloops and BC-3 East/Princeton/Penticton.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 170
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 170 - TC-1 East/Hope/Cache Creek/Prince George. TC-1 leaves the freeway at Exit 170 and turns north up the Fraser River Canyon. The freeway continues east as BC-5 (Coquihalla Highway) and BC-3 (Crowsnest Highway).

item.title: BC-3 East - Allison Pass
item.description: BC-3 east at Allison Pass Summit - Elevation 1,342m.

item.title: TC-1 East - Route Diagram
item.description: TC-1 East - Route Diagram showing BC-5 (Coquihalla Highway), BC-3 (Crowsnest Highway) and TC-1 (Trans-Canada Highway). TC-1 leaves the freeway at Hope.

item.title: BC-3 East - Freeway Ends
item.description: Freeway Ends eastbound on BC-3 East (Crowsnest Highway). Highway begins climb towards Allison Pass. Highway remains four lanes eastbound for the next 10 km.

item.title: BC-3 East / BC-5 North at Split
item.description: BC-3 East / BC-5 North at BC-3/BC-5 Split - Exit 177. Merge right for Exit 177 - BC-3 East (Crowsnest Highway) to Princeton/Osoyoos/Penticton. Merge left for BC-5 North (Coquihalla Highway) to Merritt/Kelowna/Kamloops. The freeway continues along BC-5 north.

item.title: BC-3 East - Sunday Summit
item.description: BC-3 East shield at the top of Sunday Summit.

item.title: Hunter Creek Rest Area - Highway Information
item.description: Route map for the adjacent area of British Columbia, and distances to major destinations. Three routes split off into the interior of British Columbia at Hope just east of here: BC-5 to Coquihalla Pass, TC-1 through the Frasier River Canyon, and BC-3 over Allison Pass.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95
item.description: Approaching BC-3 East/BC-95 North split in 1300 metres. BC-3 East joins BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (AB). BC-95/BC-93 north to Invermere and Radium.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-95A
item.description: BC-3/BC-95 west to Fernie and Radium Hot Springs at BC-95A to Kimberley.

item.title: BC-3 East Approaching BC-95A
item.description: Use BC-93/BC-95 north for Fort Steele, Fairmont, and Invermere, approaching BC-95A on BC-3 east.

item.title: BC-95 North at BC-3
item.description: BC-95 north at BC-3 (Crowsnest Highway) west to Creston and Nelson, east to Cranbrook.

item.title: BC-95 North at BC-3
item.description: BC-95 north approaching BC-3 (Crowsnest Highway).

item.title: BC-3 East Exit 177
item.description: BC-3 east, Crowsnest Highway at Exit 177, BC-5 north, Coquihalla Highway to Merritt, Kelowna, and Kamloops.

item.title: TC-1 East Nearing BC-5/BC-3
item.description: TC-1 east at Exit 170, and advanced signage for Exit 177, BC-3/BC-5 junction.

item.title: TC-1 East Nearing Exit 170
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 170, TC-1 East/Hope/Prince George/Cache Creek, 2000 metres.

item.title: TC-1 East Route Diagram
item.description: Hope area route diagram for TC-1, BC-3, and BC-5.

item.title: TC-1 West at BC-3/BC-5 Jct.
item.description: TC-1 west at TC-1 to Vancouver, and BC-3/BC-5 to Merritt/Princeton.

item.title: Trans-Canada Leaves Freeway
item.description: Trans Canada leaves freeway at Exit 170, on TC-1 east.

item.title: BC-3 East - Crowsnest Highway
item.description: BC-3 (Crowsnest Highway) shield

item.title: BC-3 East - Maximum 60 km/h
item.description: Maximum 60 km/h on BC-3 west

item.title: BC-3 East BC-93 South Jct.
item.description: BC-3 east at BC-93 south to US Border

item.title: BC-3 East BC-93 South Jct.
item.description: Closeup of BC-3 (Crowsnest Hwy)/BC-93 shields on BC-3 east

item.title: BC-3 West BC-93 South
item.description: BC-3/BC-93 junction on BC-3 west

item.title: BC-3 West BC-93 South Jct.
item.description: BC-93 south to Roosville and US Border on BC-3 west

item.title: Distance Marker on BC-3 West
item.description: Distance marker to Cranbrook and Trail on BC-3 east. 100 km/h sign in background.

item.title: Welcome To British Columbia - BC-3 West
item.description: Welcome To British Columbia on BC-3 west

item.title: 16th Ave. South at Erickson St. - Creston
item.description: 16th Ave. South at Erickson St. in Creston. Turn right for BC-21; left for BC-3 (no Crowsnest symbol on the BC-3 shield).

item.title: BC-6 South at BC-3
item.description: BC-6 South At BC-3 Junction.
